name: @erickmerchant/assets
description: Generate css using postcss, and js using browserify and babel.

scripts.fixtures: node ./cli.js --browsers 'Chrome <= 47' fixtures/js/index.js fixtures/css/index.css fixtures/build-min/ && node ./cli.js --no-min --browsers 'Chrome <= 47' fixtures/js/index.js fixtures/css/index.css fixtures/build-no-min/ && node ./cli.js --browsers 'Chrome <= 47' --electron fixtures/js/electron.js fixtures/build-electron/

author: Erick Merchant <erickmerchant@gmail.com>
